Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the century (part I) and his disillusionment at the height of the Second World War after he sees the Japanese war efforts in China (part II).
